COMMENT: Jan 8: Head coach Jonathan Gannon noted Monday that Humphries (knee) has to wait to get surgery for his torn ACL, Bob McManaman of The Arizona Republic reports.
Jan 5: The Cardinals placed Stills (knee) on injured reserve Friday.
Dec 29: The Cardinals placed Ledbetter (knee) on injured reserve Friday.
Dec 29: Coach Jonathan Gannon said Friday that Brown (heel) will be placed on injured reserve, ending his 2023 campaign, Darren Urban of the Cardinals' official site reports.
Dec 20: Arizona placed Woods (abdomen) on injured reserve Wednesday, Darren Urban of the team's official site reports.
Dec 20: The Cardinals placed Swaim (calf) on injured reserve Wednesday, Darren Urban of the team's official site reports.
Nov 21: White (biceps) was placed on injured reserve Tuesday, Darrin Urban of the Cardinals' official website reports.
Sep 23: The Cardinals placed Watkins (biceps) on injured reserve Saturday, Darren Urban of the team's official site reports.
